metadata.name: Rave Pigs
metadata.description:
"Rave Pigs" is an NFT collection by Boys Noize which led to a remix competition.  
Holders were able to download the stems of their NFTs and make something new.

It‚Äôs also the name of my winning entry. üê∑ü•á  
To complete the circle, my track is available now as an ERC-1155 NFT (25 editions).

This NFT will grant you access to exclusive material in a token-gated Discord channel, including sample packs, visuals and free mints.

Original Rave Pigs NFTs at disposal  :  
Rave Pigs #6  
Rave Pigs #2664  
Rave Pigs #4124 (courtesy of Bitwax)  
Rave Pigs #4386 (courtesy of Bitwax)

Stems used :  
Tunes_Tune Acid Bass or Synth_Synth8 (filtered)  
Tunes_Tune Kick or Break_Kick 5 (re-pitched)  
Tunes_Tune Perc_Percussion 3  
Tunes_Tune Perc_Percussion 9  
Tunes_Tune Perc_Percussion 10 (cut)

Artwork :  
3D assets by MW Stands For, final design by Tarek Okbir üé®
